name: out twogether
description:
- in out twogether you follow [creator] on their jorney through the ai - garden -

- there are only two of you, and in order to escape, you'll have to work twogether -

- combining mechanics from  two different genres, a platformer and a puzzle box -

- can you find your way through the garden?  -

the game was made in 48 hours for united gamejam <3

downloadable version recommended

[mac version coming soon]
